__comment: total timeout in second for this suite. Functionality for this could be implemented later with separate JIRA task

testcases.name: dummy
testcases.__comment1: TC name to be run bench, same as bench.config['name']
testcases.__comment2: TC specific timeout. Functionality for this could be implemented later with separate JIRA task
testcases.__comment3: how many times this should be executed, 1=default value
testcases.__comment4: how many times TC will be rerun when it fails
